TextView.android:text: Hampden 2 bed 2 bath condo in Morning-side Condominium complex in clean rental shape and priced to flip. All of the listed comps are in the Morning-side complex. There are various street names and addresses that are a part of this 13 acre community. All comps are built around the early to mid 1970's with nearly exact same layouts (some minimal variation). Our subject works as a straightforward flip.

There are two recent sales (Feb 2017) for $270,000; both of these condos have the same layout and same beds/baths as our subject and fixed with clean flip remodels. We have placed the flip budget at $25,000. Our subject has nice cabinetry in the kitchen and bathrooms that are usable for flip. The kitchen can be complete with new counter-tops, hardware, appliances, light fixtures and back-splash if you wish. There are ceiling fans in good condition and hardwood flooring in the entryway and kitchen you may or may not choose to keep.

The HOA on this building is $371 per month. With this HOA fee and market rent on these condos at around $1500 per month, this project does look better as a fix and sell. Close is April 19. The property is already vacant. This date can possibly be moved sooner. Please let us know if you would like to request a faster close.
If you are an agent, your buyers price including 2.8% commission: $195,314
